title: Tin Foil Hat #34: The Fix Is In With Brody Stevens and Brian Tuohy
description:
Welcome to another fun exciting episode of Tin Foil Hat with Sam Tripoli. Today, Ryan and Sam, welcome, comedian extraordinaire Brody Stevens and author Brian Tuohy, to discuss whether professional sports are rigged or not. This episode we discuss...
1)The book "The Fix Is In!"
2) FBI Freedom of Information Act
3) World Cup and Euro Leagues
4) ’82 New York Knicks and the Cocaine
5) NASCAR
6) NFL
7) UFC
8) MLB
Please check out Brian's website TheFixisIn.net
